## spark_apply_log

## Description
Writes data to log under `spark_apply()`. 


## Usage
```r
spark_apply_log(..., level = "INFO") 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| ... | Arguments to write to log. |
| level | Severity level for this entry; recommended values: `INFO`, `ERROR` or `WARN`. |
